+@name: Nadia - The Secret of Blue Water

info.+content: Nadia - The Secret of Blue Water
El misterio de la piedra azul
Nadia et le secret de l'eau bleue
ふしぎの海のナディア

In 1889, the world is on the pinnicle of great discoveries in technology. In mankinds grasp for the future, a sinister foe known only as Gargoyle, obsessed with restoring the former Atlantean empire to the glory it once held, begins his plans to take over the world. Nadia, with the help of a young inventor, Jean Ratlique, and Captain Nemo of the submarine Nautilus, must fight to save the world from Gargoyle and Neo-Atlantis. Based on the Novel '20,000 Leagues Under the Sea' by Jules Verne.
"Blue Water" (ブルーウォーター) by Miho Morikawa
"Ai no San'nin-gumi" (愛の3人組) by Kumiko Takizawa, Kenyuu Horiuchi and Toshiharu Sakurai (ep 34)
"Doushite sou na no?" (どうしてそうなの?) by Yuko Mizutani (ep 34)
"Hajimete no Koi" (はじめての恋) by Noriko Hidaka and Yoshino Takamori (ep 34)
"Let's Go, Jean-kun" (レッツ・ゴー・ジャンくん) by Noriko Hidaka (ep 34)
"Umi yori mo yasashiku" (海よりも優しく) by Yoshino Takamori (ep 34)
